name: Alisha Pickett
text: I didn't even want to give them one star, but that was the only was I could write the review. Regions is stealing money from my husband's account, please no one open a account here! They are also doing the same thing to my neighbors. When we confront them about that act like we're the stupid ones and we have proof! So please do not open at regions.

name: Amanda Langley
text: The staff is always wonderful here. I absolutely love this bank.

name: Joanna
text: This small town backward bank staff listens to gossip from a soirée that has been in my personal life for fifteen years and treats me like his word is the gospel. If he was unhappy to the extent of being financially abused , why does he continue to keep me on his accounts? They are too envolved with our personal affairs to treat me descent. I am a client as much as he is, they should have the fortitude to understand business is business and tell him the same. Instead they will not say one word to me when I drive thru or at the counter. I feel like I am wearing the scarlet letter.

name: Rob Parker (Big Body)
text: I think they are great

name: Loren Bodine
text: Sucks!!! So far not having a good experience with the regions bank in Guntersville

name: Easy G
text: Horrible customer service

name: Daniel Mccormack
text: Super nice understanding and supportive staff. Will take extra time to help with any questions or anything else you need.

resp.text: Hi Daniel. Thank you for the rating and review! We appreciate having you as a customer.

name: Jourdan Lowery
text: Great bank just stopped here to cash a check but very friendly employees and clean real good bank to do business with

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Jordan. We appreciate having you as a customer!

name: Eddie Snow
text: Convenient. Nice people. But come on. 4 drive through lanes and 1 person working all 4. Just ridiculous on Regions part.

resp.text: We certainly hear your concerns and have made sure to pass them to our Complaints team for further review. If there's any other concerns our team can address with you, please email us at askRegions@regions.com. -Tyler

name: Lindsey Nicole
text:
This bank is completely understaffed. This is twice I have wait 45 minutes for a banking transaction through the drive through... that is insane. I counted 31 cars while I sat and waited. This branch is suffering and so are the staff! I feel for the workers as they are always so friendly and do not deserve to be working understaffed.  Regions, do better and higher more employees!

My husband and I have been banking her for 10 + years and we are changing banks now because of this issue. I can no longer handle the wait time because of the other branch closing in Gardendale.

resp.text: We've made sure to have this matter documented. If we can learn more, please send us an email to askRegions@regions.com with your phone number. -Tyler

name: ildiko kiraly
text: Regions Bank in Gardendale is completely understaffed. The last few times I’ve gone through the drive through, the lines have been 20 cars deep and the walk in is at least 10 deep. They close the other branch, laid off staff but never replaced them at the now overwhelmed branch. The poor tellers are constantly apologizing to customers for the wait time.  Stop cutting costs.

resp.text: We'd like to apologize for your experience. Our team has made sure to document these details. If we can ever assist you, please feel free to send us an email to askRegions@regions.com. -Ana

name: ProYak Fishing
text: This branch serves a huge geographical area and is always lined out into the road. Not uncommon to spend 30 mins in the drive thru. There really needs to be another branch in the area or more staff to accommodate the high customer volume. This has been a problem here for a long time.

resp.text: Hey, there! Our team would like to make sure we have these details fully documented. If we can chat with you, please send us an email with your phone number to askRegions@regions.com. -Ana

name: Brick Mason
text: I contacted them with a Regions credit card issue that I had. Regions posted my payment into the wrong account so I was told by corporate to contact the local branch manager. I talked with an assistant manager and was reassured that he would talk with the manager to get it resolved and they never called back. Regions has no loyalty to their customers.

resp.text: Our apologies for any frustration this may have caused. We definitely hear your concerns and appreciate your feedback. We've made sure to pass it along to the appropriate channels. If you'd like to further discuss, feel free to email us at askRegions@regions.com. -Trish

name: Harleigh Love
text: This branch is really good. I walked in and was immediately greeted. I only had to wait about 5 mins to speak with someone. Everyone was super nice and helped me with everything I came in for and more. I will definitely be going to this branch more.

name: Michael Bell
text:
Gardendale Regions:
Ridiculously long wait times in drive-thru. Have never seen more than 2 tellers working the drive-thru.
Wait times inside also bad - has only been 1 or 2 tellers helping inside when I have been there; there is a greeter, which I don't need - put the greeter behind a teller station to actually help!
And don't tell me you will "pass this along" like you tell others because nothing changes.
Sorry I left BNVA to come to this Regions. Think I will switch to BB&T.

resp.text: We apologize for the inconvenience this has caused for you when visiting this location. We've made sure to have this documented. We appreciate your feedback and if we can help with anything else, please don't hesitate to reach out. -Tyler

name: Summer Glover
text: Don’t bank here unless you enjoy sitting in lines that never move.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that you experienced an extended wait time at your visit. If our team may ever assist you with anything, please feel free to email us at askRegions@regions.com. -Ana

name: Jeff Neu
text: Slow and very poor service.

resp.text: Our apologies for any frustration and your wait time. We have forwarded your concerns to the appropriate channel. If you'd like to further discuss, be sure to email us at askRegions@regions.com. -Trish

name: Rakesh Patel
text: This branch really need a help.  Need to open up a branch in Morris or Warrior some ware. Need a new manager tooo. I am with regions since 11 years. Never seen like this before. Manager didn’t resolve my problem I had.

name: Chickadee
text: The drive through is ridiculous!! It’s too slow every time I come. Wait time 30 minutes or longer.

name: Paul Hamer
text: Please fix the EXTREMELY SLOW Saturday Drive thru service! Come on. Every weekend it just sucks having to wait forever because of short staffing! Add personnel and solve this issue.

resp.text: We're sorry for any frustration you have had. Our team would like to document these details. If we can call you, please send us an email with your phone number to askRegions@regions.com. -Ana

name: David Abraham
text: I just need to get to an ATM and their wait line is so long and awful, bad excuse for a bank

name: Sandra Myles
text: I have Never had a issue with the representatives of this bank. Everyone I had the pleasure of doing business with, has always been very helpful and kind. Keep up the good work!!

name: Carla Gonzalez
text: Never had to wait so long in a drive thru line they need new staff!!!!!!

name: Rebecca Richardson
text: Took a friend that banks there to resolve a banking issue. We were seen right away and Ms. Roberts resovled the issue quickly and professionally.

name: Anthony Crowe
text:
I only gave one star because there is nothing lower.
Not sure who the lady was running the drive thru but it was only 9:30 am and apparently she was already in a bad mood. My office manager had asked me to drop off the credit card payments for her since this option is no longer available to do online any longer. I pulled into the drive thru no one in front of me, know one behind and hand her the payments. She quickly snaps at me that there is a 3 transaction maximum in the drive thru. I tell her I didn't know and with attitude she says "It's right there on the sign".  Next she complains because the office had not torn off the check stubs as she puts all but 3 of the payments back in the drawer for me to get. I asked her what she was doing and she said we have a 3 transaction limit. I look in my mirror and still I'm the only person in the drive thru. I told her to just give me those 3 back and I would go to another branch which I did. The Regions in downtown Birmingham on 3rd Ave S knows how to treat customers. I will never go back to the Odum Road location and will be switching all my company visa's to another bank.

name: Cris Galang
text: This bank messed up our account and closed it without our knowledge. Their branches don't even communicate with each other apparently.  We have been passed around to several different people who have no clue about how they can help make the mistake they made right. Their customer service is terrible.. you have to be on hold at least 20 mins to finally be able to talk to someone. I would not trust such incompetent people to manage our funds.

name: lady foxx
text: Ronnie is great to bad he had to leave love this location

name: Brandi Braunstein
text: I think I was just discriminated against at Regions Bank because I'm disabled! Everyone in my family is removing their money from there.

name: Michael Johnston
text: Senior staff at this location have very poor customer service skills. The branch tellers are nice to work with for your day to day banking but otherwise this isn't a great Regions Bank location.

name: Freddy Nava
text: If your in a hurry or not , forget this place, slowest branch I've ever been to

name: Jenny cairns
text: Very nice

name: Kaitlin S
text: Friendly staff, fast and helpful...been with Refions a long time, one of the better branches

name: Mike S
text: Would never bank with this pathetic excuse for a bank again.. Details arent important at this point.. horrible service and they fail at so many levels..

name: daniel roberson
text: SLOW!!! I have never not been in there and had not to wait. They need to open another branch in that area or hire more people. I am going to another location or moving all my money to Wells Fargo.

name: Jeannette Cruz
text: slowest region ive been to

name: Steve Cagle
text: Called but cant talk with a human.

name: Charles B Ireland
text: Always good to do business here.

name: Goldstar Auto Brokers
text: the best bank i ever had to deal with. Even better than regions and wells fargo bank. Make sure you ask For MARK!!!!!!

name: Mustafa AL-Obaidi
text: The WORST bank ever here!!!! It used to be a good running business. The current manager is too lazy & he is out of his office most of the time!!!!! PNC Irondale BANK, is truly one of the worst banks that I have ever banked with. This bank used to have a better customer service. Unfortunately, the old branch manager left this branch. Then, the customer service deteriorated BIG TIME! They never picked up their phone calls.

name: Tommy Morris
text: Very friendly and helpful staff.

name: BELONG GTA
text: Yayyy

name: James Fleischmann
text: I was calling to ask a question about the proper way to handle something.  They put me on hold.  Then they hung up on me after 7 minutes.  Further phone calls were picked up and then hung up immediately.

name: A Smothers
text: Great banking services

name: Don Beasley
text: Friendly and courteous

name: Ben Lopez
text: Poor costumer service.

name: Melissa Jones
text: We have been customers with this bank for 10+ years. Before it became Wells Fargo. First few years has been good doing our banking business with them. Now though it's been a nightmare. They are no help with issues concerning my account. I would not recommend this bank and seriously consider moving my money to another bank! Wells Fargo should be ashamed.

resp.text: Thank you for your detailed review, Melissa. I'm truly sorry you haven't received the customer service you expect of us, and I want to thoroughly review your concerns. Please email me at HLSocial@wellsfargo.com with your full name, username, phone number, and address (no account numbers). I look forward to discussing this further. -AJ, Wells Fargo HL Social

name: Mattison Johnson.
text: Slowest drive through I've ever been to had one car in front of me and still waited 30 minutes. Do not waste your time because they are in no hurry and take their precious time save your gas and time and go inside because the machines outside are always broke

resp.text: This is valuable feedback, Mattison. I'm very sorry about the slow customer service at this branch. Please email me at HLSocial@wellsfargo.com with your full name, phone number, address, and more details about your visit (no account numbers). Also, please mention your review on a Wells Fargo location. I’ll forward your concerns appropriately. -AJ, Wells Fargo HL Social

name: James C Gibson
text: Always friendly staff and knowledgeable about all my banking issues good or bad

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback, James. Thanks for choosing Wells Fargo. -AJ, Wells Fargo HL Social

name: jeff dunn
text: went to the atm to make a deposite after hours on a weekday. atm was down but said there is another one on the premises. yeah it was also down and said the same thing. the kicker  is I went back at noonish on the next buisness day and they were still both out of service. wonderful service wells fargo. way to take care of your customers!!!

resp.text: Thanks for bringing this to our attention, Jeff. I apologize for the inconvenience and have forwarded your feedback about the ATMs at this branch appropriately. If you have additional concerns please don't hesitate to email HLSocial@wellsfargo.com and mention your review and Google username (no account numbers). -Janet, Wells Fargo HL Social

name: Eyvonne Jantz
text: I have banked with Wells Fargo going on 8 years now the people are very friendly and polite can't see myself banking anywhere else.

name: Alex C
text: Not a bad bank to use for your daily needs, the anytime deposit is amazing and helps wonders. I would rate 5 stars, but Wells Fargo doesn't offer a blocker to out on your account so you can't spend more than you have in it. Then the app is sometimes slow to tell you that it was overdrawn, so then you get charged an overdraft fee instead of having the time to go in and correct it..

resp.text: Thanks for your thoughtful feedback. I'm glad you've found the deposit options to be helpful, but I want to be sure to forward your concerns about the app and overdrafts to the appropriate team. Could you email HLSocial@wellsfargo.com with some details about what happened? Please mention your review and Google username so I can keep an eye out for your message (no account numbers). Thanks so much. -Janet

name: Shiva Harney
text:
Very unfriendly rude people except the teller who was helping me. Should of went to the Gulf Shore branch near where I live. They (Gulf Shore Branch) are so much friendlier and helpful and kind a min you walk in the door no matter who you are.
Will never go back to Foley Branch again!

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback, Shiva. I'm disappointed to learn about your unpleasant experience with some of our team members. Please email me at HLSocial@wellsfargo.com with your username and more details about your visit (no account numbers). To ensure I can forward your concerns appropriately, please also mention your review on a Wells Fargo location. I look forward to hearing from you. -Cory, Wells Fargo HL Social

name: Kimberly Nobles
text: Such an amazing staff! Eriq helped cash my check and gave me some information on a new account. He even gave me information on promotions that they were offering their new account holders. Definitely happy

name: Melissa Herring
text: Jennifer Peters at the Foley branch is knowledgeable and helpful she has restored my trust in bankers. Her customer service is a step above the rest.

name: Ragnar Danneskhold
text: Went in and tried to use the bathroom before withdrawing some money. Was told bathrooms were for customers only. Told them we were wells fargo clients. Then they said they had no bathrooms. Will be contacting the district manager to lodge a formal complaint.

resp.text: Please accept my apology for your experience, and the inconvenience this has caused you, Ragnar. Could you email me at HLSocial@wellsfargo.com with your Google username and more details about your visit? Please remember to mention you posted a review on a Wells Fargo location so I can forward this matter appropriately. For your security, I ask that you refrain from sharing account numbers. Thanks so much. -AJ, Wells Fargo HL Social

name: Allison Ostrowski
text: I actually rate this branch 0 stars. The worst customer service I have ever received. I've been a loyal banker with Wells Fargo for 3 years and they treated me as if I were insignificant today. I spoke with the manager because of a situation where my fiance went to deposit money in my account (as he has many times before theough the ATM and with a teller) because im at work and he was told he couldn't. The option wasn't there with the ATM either. So I called to inquire on if the policy has changed or of the ATM was no longer offering the option. I was told they have no control over who deposited at the ATM multiple times as if I were an idiot and then told that the policy changed in May (ever think to notify customers when policies change?). I was told he could deposit a check or money order but to deposit cash would be fraudulent. When I pointed out his tone and the fact that he was talking down to me he continued with "so you called over something I have no control over and I told you I have no control over and your upset because I can't control it, is that correct?" That is very riderand condescending. II wil be closing my account and banking else where as soon as possible. No wonder this branch only has 3 stars. He is a poor excuse of a manager and exemplimes customer service at it's absolute worst. He refused to give me his name at the end of the call but thankfully I document everything and when I don't I always do my recon and research. A little trick I have learned working in customer service the past 10 years is record every conversation. Unfortunately I didn't start recording in the very beginning of the conversation when he said his name, as I did not expect the call to take such a turn. So I only have the last half of the call on record. That's ok though, I will still be going through the proper channels to let Wells Fargo know what poor service I received. It is unacceptable and they deserve to know how their employees are treating their customers so that it can probably be addressed and handled.

name: Courtney Barlow
text: I've always had a good experience at this bank. All tellers have been nice and helpful.

name: Tammy Nance
text:
Unless you are a special little friend of these banksters or a sheriff's deputy.

I would recommend banking elsewhere. Rude, even obnoxious staff.

name: Christi Johanning
text: The worst branch with the rudest staff. Do not go to this bank.

name: katelyn campbell
text: Very rude teller that I spoke it over the phone about currency exchange

name: Wendy Dean
text: I have banked at Southern States Bank for several years.  They know me by name and are extremely personable.  I feel very fortunate to receive the customer service they provide...it is second to NONE!!

name: CSI Restoration & Cleaning
text: This bank is so friendly everytime i go in there, they know you by name. really makes you feel welcomed.

name: Neal Kelly
text: I am very happy with the service and the way they handle my account.  Very personable and attentive.

name: CarolAnn Miracle
text: Friendly, helpful staff.  Lovely inviting lobby.

name: Naomi Brown
text: Wonderful! Great experience from the moment you walk in the door.

name: Stephanie Johndrow
text: If you are employed at a 8am-5pm job then you will not be able to bank with them during the week since they are only open from 8:30am to 5pm.

name: Graham Ingram
text: Please update your hours so people stop wasting their gas and time on a Saturday morning. Pathetic customer service.

name: Kristy Hope
text: Great customer service!! Sweet people always a warm welcome

name: Izzy J
text: Pleasant and very knowledgeable staff!

name: william miller
text: Great staff, Kevin is a very good manager. His team helps with what ever you need.

name: V K
text: The receptionist was just about as rude as they come. Honestly. Not to mention, the line rang and then dropped without any reason. I will add that this is a BANK telephone number. Avoid at all costs.

name: Tammy Johns
text: Just plain rude

name: Andrew Lewis
text: May 1st, 2020 I was waiting on my first paycheck to be deposited into my bank account since January. I called  HR at work and everything indicated that it was deposited. I call the bank, at about 1200 hours and I inquired about the deposit. West Alabama Bank said they received it and shall be in account by 1700. I waited till today, May 4th, 2020 and called my bank to let them know I still have not received the money in the bank. I don't know how long it took for them to call my wife back to let her know they straightened out the problem. But as soon as I can, I will be going to a different back. I can't stand to be lied to about my money.

name: Jennifer van Arcken
text: I am very pleased with the great customer support, banking and investment services provided by Synovus in Montgomery. Their team and bank goes above and beyond to provide their account holders with service and financial advice. Rex Huxford is a great asset to their team!

name: Best Wearhouse (The Box)
text: Landscaping is beautiful Staff is always friendly and on time!

name: Pat
text: I was thinking about changing my bank from this bank , just thru my experience with them ...after reading these reviews...I'm Definitely going to be changing Banks now,,,!!!

name: Mike Morris
text: Great Bank great service

name: Derek Tidwell
text: ATM does not work. I wandered why such a low rating.  No big secret.  Piss poor management shows from a mile away. Heres my 1 star to add to the mix

name: Jeremy
text: I went here to wire funds and the banker, who was busy trying to sell me a home interest loan,  wired to the wrong account number.  No apologies or anything.  When I asked if they would remove their own fees that they charged me for the transaction he basically just said I should have caught the mistake.   I have to pay fees for you to make a sales pitch and wire my money to the wrong place??  I'm currently shopping for a home loan, but I wouldn't borrow ten dollars from this bank after the service I've seen.

name: The Awakening Enthusiast
text:
If you are looking for a good bank this is definitely not the place you want to go. I'm not speaking out of anger I'm speaking from experience I am currently dealing with this bank and they have put me and my family through the biggest hardship do to their lack of caring and lack of communication.

We deposited a check as anyone would do when somebody gives them a check we never had the funds available to us until the check would clear so we never spent any of the funds at all. we sat patiently waiting like normal people would for the check to clear. The check didn't clear which in a normal case it would just tell you that the check did not clear and maybe charge you a fee or something. No no no not here not with BBVA Compass. Nope they take it and put a hold on the check even after it doesn't clear and then take your account in the negative the amount of that check and then refused to take the hold off and let you continue to get fees with bills that are trying to go through even though you have a very positive balance that they are withholding from you.

Right now because of this Bank my car payment is going to be late as well as one of my credit cards I drive for Uber and Lyft all of my money that gets deposited goes into that account which I cannot deposit in turn leaves me with an empty gas tank so I cannot work so there's money I'm losing also. This Bank when we called the gentleman that we spoke with on the phone refused to let us speak to a manager we have the conversation recorded and when we told him that we needed a manager or somebody higher up to try to fix this for us and we were being polite mind you, his exact words were no he won't know he won't as in saying no the manager will not clear it up and then he refused he said that he refused to put us on the phone with somebody higher up.

I'm sorry but in normal cases if you deposit a check into your bank account and it doesn't go through it doesn't take you into the negative the entire check amount especially if you have a positive balance. This just shows BBVA Compass true colors and I will make sure to let anybody know that I come in contact with which is a lot of people because I drive for both Uber and Lyft that BBVA Compass is not for the people they are for themselves!

name: Awakening To The Universe
text: this has to be the worst bank with the worst customer service and least amount of compassion out of any bank that I have ever dealt with or heard of I would steer clear of this bank if you are looking to get a new account look elsewhere don'tdon't say I didn't warn you

name: Ken Lee
text:
October 13th,called and spoke with a representative and told them my goal was to open a business account with them so that I can obtain a SECURED business credit card so i could add to my credit mix. The account was opened and the secured business credit card application was submitted.
My application was drug out over a month because of “covid” just to get a denial letter for the secured business credit card(my own money).
Having a quota to meet every month was mentioned while my account was being set up so It seems my time was wasted just to get me to open an account.

name: Magenta Freeman
text: I've had a great experience with BBVA so far; so much better than my previous bank, and even before I was a customer! Kind, courteous service with a smile, and a relaxed, accommodating approach - something you rarely see in a bank. Not to mention a great mobile app experience. I'm very happy I chose to move to them!

name: Charles Stull
text:
Office hours are 9 to 5. I show up at 10 to cash a $90 check. Only the drive up window is operating. After waiting 15 minutes I'm told there is a $10 fee to cash a check written on a Compass account.
Never accept a check written on Compass bank accounts. Sorry customer relationship

name: Bethanie Ricci
text: The ATM ate my debit card on Monday (their ATM has been having issues but I’m sure it will get resolved). However, whenever I went inside the branch to let a teller know what the issue was, Brittany filed a maintenance call to the ATM repairer and proceeded to have a new card expedited to me. I got my card on Wednesday (2-3 days later as Brittany had promised) and whenever I went to activate my card, I saw that another debit card had been requested for me. Upon calling the branch, Brittany picked up and explained how she’d checked on Wednesday morning to see if my new card had been sent. She didn’t see any conformation, so she proceeded to request another card for me. Now I have my primary debit card and a back up on the way. Brittany did a fantastic job and her customer service is excellent. Thank you for making this annoying experience as painless as possible and displaying excellent customer consideration.

name: The Awakening Enthusiast
text:

text:
I have been with BBVA Compass way before they added BBVA, I have stayed with Compass because of the professional service , the friendly smile they greet me with and the attitude they have when I have a question or need help with the things that come up just day to day.
Thank you !!!

name: Gloria Mays-Keys
text: The  Night drop box is Nasty.  Full of Bugs.

name: Elizabeth Evenes
text: I've been with this bank for years and it's 8:59 am and they open at 9:00 am and I'm getting chewed out for waiting outside I should of stayed with Wells Fargo lame ass !

name: Chasity Dixon
text: Crystal, Destiny, and Sandra are always sooo helpful. Would definitely recommend this branch to anyone.

name: randy hall
text: I have been banking here for years and never had a problem til recently. Stopped in for info on a personal loan like I have before and always had a good experience. This time I was met at the door and told to leave my name and number and a loan officer would call me to set up and appointment. Here we are a week later and haven't been contacted. Took my business elsewhere

name: Brent Hilyer
text: I’ve always had good service from this hometown bank.

name: Robert Hendrickson
text: What kind of bank is this?? I have constant problems with my account, and when i call on a saturday (they are open) no one answers the phone??? Im having weird charges on my account (someone is messing with MY money) and i cant get ahold of anyone to help me. The online banking/app is a joke you cant do anything on it without jumping through 1000 hoops. Wells fargo is just as bad but i much rather go bank to them atleast then ill have someone able to help me with my money and bank account problems! I highly do not recommend Phenix-Girard local bank who dont give a damn about the locals.

name: crazy light
text: Online transfers are joke.. the only time you can transfer money online is when they are open. here it is 7:50 Friday at night with a flat tire needing money transferred from one account to another to get me a tire so I can go home won't happen until Monday the transfer thanks phenix-girard for the comfy night and sleeping in my car.. so if you need money transferred just go when they're open no difference than doing it online online banking a joke

name: Jerry “The Dog” Malone
text: Great Bank my family bank here

name: Candice Watkins
text: They have great and friendly staff.

resp.text: I’m happy to hear you feel this way, Candice. Thanks so much for the feedback. -Shannon, Wells Fargo HL Social

name: Belinda B
text: Very sweet staff. Two ATMs available, however during business hours the drive thru ATM lane is also a window banking lane making it impossible to zip through quickly as other drive up ATMs. After hours it is convenient but not while window is open.

text: Fast, friendly services!  Couldnt ask for a better experience!

name: Lucas Rowell
text: ATM lane should only be used for ATM only. The window needs to be shut off or move ATM to  outside lane.

name: Tiffany Crabtree
text: Fast, friendly service

name: S James
text: Very outstanding,  very communicative,  answers all questions,

name: Sadegh Poozesh
text: I got a mortgage loan from this bank with Mary Sandlin as the lender. First, I have to warn everybody who would like to lend money from this bank and specifically this lender, that their numbers that they give you at the beginning are far lower than what you see at the end (closing). Second, they will put you in dark till the attorney brings paperworks and ask you to sign the numbers that you had not seen before. My monthly payment went up from more than 100$ at the closing compared to the "final" loan they sent me 2 days before the closing.  Soo disappointed!

resp.text: Sadegh - Thank you for leaving feedback. Please reach out to us at (866) 616-6020 so we may identify ways to improve your experience.

name: Jay Neese
text: Julia McCreight went above and beyond to get us an incredible rate on our mortgage refinance, saving us hundreds a month.  Highly recommended!

resp.text: We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

name: Streetninja 0909
text: Julia McCreight was very easy to work with, and found me a great line of credit for a new home! Thanks for a painless experience in buying my first home!

resp.text: Roland 0311, we're happy to hear you had such a positive experience with our team! Our team strives to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out!

Feel free to email me at HLSocial@wellsfargo.com with any questions or concerns. Be sure to mention your full name and Google username (no account numbers). -Jessica, Wells Fargo HL Social

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback on this location, Elizabeth. I know how frustrating a long wait can be, and I hope you'll accept my apology for the experience. To ensure I can forward your concerns to the appropriate team, please mention your review and Google username in an email to HLSocial@wellsfargo.com (no account numbers). I look forward to hearing from you. -Janet, Wells Fargo HL Social

To ensure I can forward your concerns to the appropriate team, please mention your review and Google username in an email to HLSocial@wellsfargo.com (no account numbers). Worst bank ever in general once a problem goes to "corporate" nothing and I mean nothing can be done . I think I could qualify for a job with them "there is nothing we can do ☺" must be a qualifying phrase.
In short "very short" my construction business has been put on hold for the next week even after funds were verified from the customers account... rent, helpers , gas and even my child's birthday are ruined they canceled my debit cards and guess what ... name: David Weaver
text: We had a great experience with John Marbury. We were looking for a low rate with low out costs, and we wanted to do business with an Alabama firm.  John was able to beat the best offer we brought him from a national vendor and we closed quickly with little hassle. Great overall experience.

name: Chase Quinn
text: I recently purchased my first home and went through First Federal Mortgage for my loan. Gloria Jackson went above and beyond to see the process went as smoothly and efficiently as possible. I simply cannot say enough good things about how she made entire process stress free and would absolutely advise anyone seeking a home loan to make First Federal Mortgage their first choice when searching.

name: megan wang
text: Rachel Trowbridge is just awesome!! We had so many questions in the mortgage application and she’s always patient and respond quickly. She did not only help us find the best rate, but also make the process smooth and easy. She’s very reliable and trustworthy. Whenever I have a question, she’s always there! Strongly recommend and I’ll go back to her again in the future.

name: baily anderson
text: I enjoyed working with Gloria Jackson while buying our home. She was available to talk everyday and very helpful in letting us know the next steps and what needed to be done. She was also very open about due dates and how it all worked if we went to long without closing

text: Gloria was extremely helpful during the loan process. She kept us up to date and on time with all the moving parts of the loan process. I highly recommend Gloria Jackson!

text: I have worked with John Marbury for two house buying processes and he has been great. Very helpful and responsive.

name: Kristin Tidwell
text: I would recommend this company over and over!  Rachel Trowbridge was awesome to work with.  I felt informed throughout the entire process.  Rachel works on solutions to get the loan closed!  You can tell she really cares about her customers!

name: Roberto Avalos
text: Hi there, Gloria Jackson help me a lot during my house buy off, as a Mexican living temporary in USA it was more beneficial to invest in a house mortgage that keep paying rent. Entire process was very easy and fully supported by FFM. Thanks a lot.

text: Absolutely a Great Experience. If you need any help in purchasing a New Home, Rachael Trowbridge with First Federal is the way to go. Made the entire process seamless.

name: Marcia Pidcock
text: We love working with Wendy Baker at First Federal Mortgage!

name: Tint Pro
text: After having two loan officers tell my wife and I we could not get our dream home and wasting over 2 weeks of our time, we were referred to Wendy Baker. She absolutely made it happen! We are so grateful for her and her teams dedication to excellence. We will refer everyone we know to her!

name: Allie Hudson
text: My husband and I bought our first home in May, and KC was highly recommended to us by our realtor. I am so glad we went with KC and First Federal for our mortgage. KC was extremely helpful, professional, timely, and was always willing to thoroughly answer any question I may have had. As a first time home buyer, this was huge and extremely important to my husband and I that we have someone who would be willing to walk us through every step of the process. KC did just that and more. He truly went above and beyond what we expected from our loan officer, and we are so thankful our realtor recommended him!

resp.text: Thank you! We are so glad we got to be a part of your First home buying experience!

name: Laura Gooch
text: KC was awesome.  He always made us feel like we were his only customer and was never bothered by our questions. He was very informative and was very willing to educate is through the process. He was with is every step of the way. He found a program perfect for our needs. I would recommend his services to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Dorothy Ewing
text: Gloria Jackson was knowledgeable and easy to work with.  We felt like she cared about us as people and we were not just another mortgage.  She attended our closing as well to make sure everything was perfect.  I would recommend Gloria to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you! We always try to be there every step of the way to make the mortgage experience a good one!

name: Ben Chamblee
text: My wife and I moved into our first home just over a month ago. Our realtor recommended KC, and I'm so glad she did! KC was courteous, effective, and just overall great to work with. He answered every question we had, and did so in a simple way. He was able to get us the best rate! And closing wasn't pushed back at all. I would highly recommend KC for anyone's mortgage needs!

resp.text: Thank you! We pride ourselves on making the loan process as smooth as possible.

name: Steven Gerding
text: Gloria Jackson at First Federal Mortgage is amazing.  We have used her for both of our mortgages.  Recently we bought a house and our buyer backed out at the last minute.  We were fortunate enough to get another buyer immediately.  Gloria did not miss a beat.  Use and the buyer wanted to close quickly and Gloria made it happen.  I have had many friends who have used other lenders and had problems.  I always recommend Gloria especially for anyone using a VA home loan.  I would highly recommend Gloria.

resp.text: Thank you Steven it was a pleasure working with you as well!

name: Chanda Mitchell
text: Thanks to Carmel  and Carol! We have bought two houses using First Federal and both times we got excellent rates. The loan officer and underwriting were very easy to work with and I would highly recommend them to anyone buying a home.

name: Katie Roy
text: Our realtor recommended First Federal Mortgage and Gloria Jackson. My husband and I just bought our first home and she was there helping us with our questions the entire way. resp.text: Thank you Katie! It was great working with you as well!

name: Daniel Bridgmon
text: After trying with two other mortgage companies, First Federal was the first to actually help us finance our first home. They were very easy to work with and talk to about what I needed to do in order to figure out what price range I could afford. I would recommend them to anyone looking for a mortgage!

resp.text: Thank you we are glad we could go on the first home buying journey with you!

name: Omar Sims
text:
I recently worked with KC Haririan at First Federal Bank in purchasing a new house.  As my mortgage broker, KC was efficient, thorough, knowledgeable, and dependable. Without a doubt, KC is an expert in mortgage financing, the purchasing process of buying a house, and in anticipating potential barriers to overcome in the process.

KC was very proactive through my purchasing/financing experience. He followed up with me via phone or email quickly without delay, he kept the process going, and stayed in constant communication with my realtor. His efficiency is exemplified in his ability to close on my house within 30 days of me winning the bid on the house.

Above all, KC is transparent and trustworthy. He is quite the professional and I will be using him and First Federal Mortgage again for my future buying experiences as well. KC represented himself and First Federal Mortgage in a remarkable fashion.

I also had the opportunity of working with KC's assistant, Haley Roscoe. Haley was equally responsive and facilitated attention to details. Anytime additional documentation was needed (or if I needed to provide additional documentation to First Federal) Haley reviewed and submitted documentation without delay. She also anticipated potential barriers and provided solutions to keep the buying/financing process going. It was truly a pleasure working with Haley and she enhanced my experience with First Federal.

resp.text: Thank you so much. We always try and do our best to make the mortgage process as quick and simple as possible! It was our pleasure to work with you too!

name: Rebecca Winslett
text: We used Gloria Jackson with First Federal, and she was very knowledgeable in guiding us through our second home purchase. She was always willing to answer our questions, via email or phone, even when she was not in the office. She followed through even after the closing was complete, and we would absolutely recommend her to anyone looking for a home mortgage lender.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Micah Colley
text: KC Haririan and his team at First Federal did a fantastic job at handling the financing of our new home. They were professional and prompt during the entire process. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Janey Whitney
text: Honest workers who does great work for his customers! Highly recommend using First Federal Mortgage in Birmingham!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words!

name: Matt Cross
text: I've been with BBVA for years (too many). The service has gone downhill. The app only successfully scans checks for deposit about 1 in 5 tries. And the two times I've replaced my debit card after BBVA hasn't sent a new one in three years and the chip was malfunctioning, I was charged a $5 card replacement fee. How about you DON'T charge me for accessing the funds you're collecting interest on? This location is currently closed, not even the drive thru is open, guess they were infected, but they could at least update their hours... Very rude security guard yelled at me for knocking on the door to ask when the drive thru would be open. I'm switching banks after 15 years.

name: Jonathon Burns
text: Terrible customer service.

text: Horrible service. We were in line at the drive thru at 4:27 and they closed the window with 5 customers in line with no explanation. The lobby is closed already, so I do not understand why the drive thru would close 30 minutes early. The site clearly states they are open until 5.

text: If I had a dollar for everytime I got to Compass and it was inexplicably closed I wouldn't be using Compass Bank anymore. text: This is not a good bank. Stay away. They didn't allow me access to a deposit for 10 days, lied to me about when it would be available, & continued to charge overdraft fees for bills I had to pay when I had plenty in my account to cover it. Very poor customer service & ethics.

name: Robin Lewis
text: Excellent service!!! My husband needed me to bring him cash. I was fighting traffic and finally pulled into bank right at 5pm. Just knowing the drive thru would be closed. To my pleasant surprise they were still opened. I told them I thought they would be closed. The bank representative told me, "We saw you coming and waited" I was blown away. This has never happened. Thank you Compass Bank!!

text: The bank associates are very helpful and quick to fix any banking issues I have.

name: Dia Malik
text: By far the worst bank I have ever been to. After waiting in line for 15 minutes, the teller conveniently announced that she is leaving for lunch. I am shocked the management is so nonchalant about the behavior of the tellers.

name: Douglas Brock
text:
Let me get this right.  There is a data breach at one of YOUR vendors so you shut down access with ZERO notification.  Then you want to charge me for replacements because YOUR VENDOR had a data breach.  Then after waiting 2 weeks for a card you completely shut down the old card once again with NO NOTIFICATION and your reaction is aww so sorry we will send you another that might get there in 2 weeks as well. UNBELIEVABLE!!!  It was Compass' issue and they should of had a new card to me overnight at no charge, period.

FYI anyone wanting to do a mortgage there watch out, their underwriters will put you aside if a bigger deal comes in.  Tacked on an additional week.  Strait from the underwriters mouth.

If there was a zero stars rating they would get it.

They caused us so much stressed not knowing how to do their job. We went to the Brookwood branch and they got everything cleared up. I already put my review once but I see it was removed.

Should you have additional questions or want to share more about your experience, please contact our customer support team at 877-788-0288.

So how do I find out what is going on with my name ? The letter was sent to my home address in bowman , ga. They have to have some help with their own bank it seems to me.

text: Great service I need lil help with my account I had somebody stole I'm hurt

text: This bank does nothing but hang up on its customers and steal your money! Buyer beware

name: Bruce Johnson
text:
Took advantage of a great rate on a CD 12 months ago.  I electronically sent them the funds.  My funds cleared within 3 days.  That was a year ago.  The WEBSITE offers no way to manage the CD.  There is no way to close the account at maturity.  They instructed me to

HAND PRINT A LETTER WITH MY NAME, ACCOUNT No. PREFERRED DISTRIBUTION, COPY OF MY DL, all Notorized so I can FAX it to their location, and in RETURN<>>>>  THEY WILL MAIL ME A CHECK!!

CLOWNS.

DO NOT DO BUSINESS with this bank!!

name: Eugene Barrett
text: A family member banked here on a loan, They passed away. I can't get them on the phone to close the account(all bills after deceased do not fall on the living, only the death bills). They won't allow me the time to get the details needed to properly close this. Very unprofessional hanging up on me at every call.

name: Brian Krueger
text:
WARNING to anyone considering opening a Money Market account at BBVA because of the advertised high rate...DON’T DO IT!!!! DO NOT FALL VICTIM to their deceptive marketing practices and awful customer service.

I haven’t fully closed my account yet, but will give you just one example of why this bank is so dysfunctional. I had to drive two hours from my house in Georgia to the closest physical BBVA branch in Oxford, Alabama to access my funds on Saturday over Memorial Day weekend to get access to my money to purchase a car.

From account opening, to what I imagine will be the same experience at account closing, this whole process has been a nightmare.

Management is truly oblivious and does not care about customer experience when the bank is advertising how wonderful their customer experience is, but literally EVERYTHING is difficult to do unless you go to a physical branch.

Why the hell offer a nation-wide money market account special when I can even access my funds because there aren’t any branches of the bank in my state.

I sent in over 6 complaints through various methods and have continued to have problems to this day.

Note to the bank: don’t both posting a response about how sorry you are and saying please contact us so we can help you. This is just a public relations stunt to try and save face. Fix your awful systems and processes, that’s all the information you need from me.

name: Ashanti Thomas
text: I was greeted when I first came through the door and immediately was directed to help. Ashley was phenomenal!!!!!! She was so friendly and seemed interested in helping me with whatever I needed. Glad I decided to bank here.

name: Pat Felder-Cato
text: There was short wait for the drive thru service .There were four lanes open, but only two cashier s working those lanes, thus it caused it bit of a back up.

name: Jack Johnson
text: This bank is a great one to have when you live in Montgomery, AL. They are a credit union which means you get all the benefits of being a smaller home town bank. When you go there in person, which is rare because they have such a robust app, they always greet you with a smile and allow you to grab a fresh coffee or water if you have to wait.  They offer great rates on auto and home loans. Check them out if you live in the Gump.

name: Tara Smith
text: Max is the best bank in the river region.

name: William McNeel
text:
I cannot tell y how much I wish I had never heard of this place.  The consistently and consistently worry the ever living hell out of me.   They should just be glad they are in Alabama and not Mississippi else I would vent my frustrations at their piss poor branch(s).

If you don’t have an account or loan with then DO NOT GET ONE.   This place will hound the hell out of you even when your current and call all of your reference. I have the proof as well.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback William. We would love to hear more about your unsatisfactory experience. Please feel free to email us at SmartMoney@myMAX.com with details. Please do not send any sensitive info, such as your account number or SSN. Your feedback helps us recognize problems and resolve issues.

text: I visited MAX today and we worked with Maria. Maria did an excellent job helping us set up our accounts and answered all of our questions. She was very knowledgeable and she was also very nice, we enjoyed our visit!

text:
Absolutely the worst experience!!! I have had a Regions account for many years and I have never been treated this way.

Went in to cash a check from my 401k and they refused to cash my check. They stated they could not verify the funds, even though I could contact my company and verify the check. The individuals I dealt with refused to speak to the them. They called "operations back office" and they said they could not cash or deposit my check into my account. I honestly felt like I was treated like a criminal.

I was able to go to another branch in Alabaster, and worked with the Assistant Branch Manager, Nicole Robinson. She was amazing!! Not only were we in and out less than 20 minutes. She had no need to call anyone to verify my check. She was an absolute pleasure and made me feel like my business was worthy of being a member of Regions.

name: Jon marsh
text: I started a small business and I make glass globe plant life. So the last few payments have been by check (which is fine)  I never experienced the type of rudeness I received like I did the other day from a teller. I've been cashing the checks through my wells Fargo account mostly and others I have cashed inside the bank I received the check from, to see if I want another account with another bank. (Walking in regions) waited 10 mins to even see a teller due to them being busy(3 customers 2 tellers) yeah that was sarcasm.  When it was finally my turn I told the cashier I need to cash this check. She responded ok I need your LICENSE  to which I provided while I signed the back of the check. Of forgot to mention this is a $25.oo check. She asked if I had an account with regions I responded no mam. She said you are aware their is a service fee on checks if you do not have an account with regions. I said no I didn't know that, that's weird. I said how much, she replied 2 dollars (not much it seems but when you struggle to make ends meet that $2 means a lot) she said yes it's just our policy " EVERYONE GETS CHARGED THE FEE IF YOU ARE NOT AN ACCOUNT HOLDER" I said ok, my bank doesn't do that. When I write a check to someone they cash without having an account with my bank it bc that's their hard earned money. She responded "well the only way I cannot charge you is if the check HOLDER gives permission to WAIVE the fee. So naturally I was pissed off. I said how is it you can say that it's a mandatory fee and EVERONE GETS CHARGED THAT FEE IF NOT AN ACCOUNT HOLDER, but if the check HOLDER called and said it's ok to WAIVE the fee. That literally makes no sense! She replied in a smart tone "well why don't you just deposit it to your wells account. I said I'm almost out of gas and just figured I could cash it here being less than a mile from my house. I said fine just cash it I'm on my way to work. I will be visiting the branch manager of regional manager tomorrow to see exactly why they say it's mandatory but it can be waived? I'm in customer service I know what it's like dealing with the public but that was uncalled for rudeness. I will recommend everyone close their account bc my friend did the day I told her what happened she said she had no idea they did this when she paid ppl by check and was outraged. So that's 1 account being closed. 1 may not matter much to this bank but I have only told her so far so next is other friends who msg me about their accounts with them.

But is there a way to streamline this a little better?

resp.text: Hi, Mandy. Our apologies for the inconvenience. If you send us an email to askRegions@regions.com providing the exact ATM location, as well as any issues you're having with the ATM, we'll see if we can pass this information to our ATM team.

Best Regions location in the state of Alabama. Everyone in this office is always willing to help and go out of their way to make it an enjoyable experience.

Thanks again!
#RegionsofJville

text: After being told I had to wait nearly 3 hours to change my PIN and that I had to be there in person, I made an appointment because I finally had enough time to wait. When I got there for my appointment, they made me wait over 30 minutes after my appointment time before being seen, so what was the point of making an appointment? They're closed on the weekend and afternoon which are the only times I'm free for more than 3 hours. I try to switch to Wells Fargo, and I have to go regions to cancel my account. Overall awful experience, and I'm still trying to get rid of them.

Please email me at HLSocial@wellsfargo.com with your full name, username, phone number, and address (no account numbers). I look forward to discussing this further. -AJ, Wells Fargo HL Social

text:
Their customer service is the worst! I opened a checking account by myself years ago, my ex was able to not only go in and sweet talk an employee into making it a joint account adding him to it (with out my permission or me signing for it) then was able to have me removed from my own account. Later after we had separated, he ran the account in the negative. They then tried to contact me to set the account back in the good. I told them I had been removed from the account by one of their staff members and they could contact my ex about the debit. I mean the whole thing was ridiculous !
DO NOT TRUST THIS BANK!!!

Absolutely closing my accounts. Terrible bank.  Hope to see this branch close soon too .

text: Bankers are friendly and helpful. If you back with WF and are in Dothan, this is the best branch to visit IMO.

name: The Dude
text:
Shortly after​ their purchase of the previous bank, Wachovia  My identity was stolen the day after i opened the account, which was done in person at the district branch, no less. Now they want ME to ASSUME RESPONSIBILIT for the debt with the promise of being compensated later...... BUT ONLY IF the "THIEF"(mind you) pays them back through a NON-COURT ORDER​ED RESTITUTION process (In other words, doesn't legally have to pay back the money even though they caught the guy red handed because of his photo being taken at an off site ATM he tried to rob ,while heavily intoxicated. He might have got away with it but he was QUICKLY found thanks to the store clerk that was able to easily ID HIM BEING THEY WERE ROOMMATES! They both share the residence in back of the lot behind the very store they were standing in....
I'm not paying Wells Fargo a dime.... They are arguably as incompetent as the moron who stole my identity by going through the dumpster behind my office...Or so he says.

name: Ronald Otis Lee
text: HAY! You guys needs to put your ducks in a row about banking here. Too many 1 Star ratings. All those 5 Star ratings say how nice you people are has nothing to do with your performance to the account holders. I left your branch with my safety deposit box I loved there to move to another branch but I hate Gardendale Brach and was coming back to your branch but, after reading how your employers are messing up people's account I might better check out another bank.

name: Susan Johnson
text: This Regions branch has been completely renovated and is open for business!  The employees meet you as you enter, asking if they can help you. Today I went inside to make a deposit and Eddie took good care of me! There is no waiting, the employees are competent and professional! The ATM is not outside of building in the elements. It is actually right inside the front door, where you can handle business without being outside in bad weather!

name: Julie Turpin
text: Worst regions bank I have ever been too. Staff is very rude and inconsiderate. Thia branch should be closed down PERMANENTLY.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear that this is your impression of us. Our team would like to have any situation you have had documented. If we can chat with you, please send us an email with your phone number to askRegions@regions.com. -Ana

name: NAs NAs
text: This new setup is a disaster, no deposit slips, no way of telling whose turn it is if there are a bunch of people waiting. Fewer tellers than they should have, the staff is nice, but this setup, whoever thought about it does not make any sense. If you go in during lunchtime then good luck.

name: iamTHATGUY uknow
text: Love the people

name: Peter Zahel
text: My son deposited his first paycheck to his Regions account on Friday. According to teller the check should be cleared by Saturday. Since my son didnt see any deposit on his account by Monday morning we have contacted the bank with an inquiry. Regions told us they (teller) deposited the check check to a wrong account. It is Wednesday afternoon and my son still doesn't have his money. Regions bank refusing to credit his account immediately until they will resolve the situation internally. Shame on them and shame on such a business practice. If we would make an error our account would be charged with monumental fees. Regions bank pretty much stole my son's money and gave it to someone else. Still waiting for resolution. We have the deposit ticket from the bank in hands..... Sounds like a material for an attorney to look at. DON'T BANK WITH REGIONS.

name: Don Baker
text: Didn't have any activity in my business account for a bit, and Regions closed it without notifying me.  My customers were depositing payments to this account.  Now I have to try and explain this to my customers, and find another bank.

name: Grey Peterson
text: They should have a sign on the door "If you are in a hurry then don't come inside". First time experience at this location. There were several cars in drive thru so I thought it would be quicker to go in (I only had one deposit to make). Parking lot was full but got lucky with one space. Walked in and three people sitting in chairs right inside door, all employees busy with customers, two empty computers with no employees. I really didn't  know what to do when I walked in. I asked the customers sitting if they were waiting for a teller and they said yes so I noted who was in front of me and stood and waited. One customer got frustrated and left so now two in front of me. Two more came in and walked ahead of us and I kindly said that we were waiting for a teller, too. They were nice, one left and the other sat down and waited. The two in front of me were there because they had wrongful credits to their account so they would be a while, too. They all said that the wait was common at this location. I stood there for 20 minutes before I finally got waited on.  The teller was nice and started to chat with me ( I was in a hurry, on my lunch and frustrated) and there was was still one person behind me. I told him that I was in a hurry and had already waited 20 minutes to please just deposit my check.  He then tried to tell me that I could have used the machine outside and or gone through the drive thru (he was still very nice). I was not. I told him I thought it would be quicker to come inside that I had never waited this long with just 2 people ahead of me.  He said that he thought it was normal to wait at all banks.  He stayed professional but I know I made him mad at the end because his smile went away. It wasn't his fault. Evidently they have a new policy that you can go to any teller for anything, opening an account, lost card, wrongful credits to your account, all of which take a long time so if you want to cash a check or make a simple deposit then don't go inside. I did hear that the drive thru is pretty quick even with a line.

name: Erik Hartwig
text:
Getting in and out of this location is a complete disaster, especially if you go at lunch time with everyone trying to get to Chick-Fil-A and the Honey Baked Ham store, and parking is horrendous.  They also have a new and weird layout inside that doesn't feel secure or that security is their number 1 priority, it feels more like a cell phone store.  Computer screens that your transactions are happening on are 100% visible to anyone close by.

The staff is friendly though.

name: Gary Grimes
text: Convenient banking easy to find

name: David Gibson
text: Drive though is fast and efficient!

name: Caleb “Sundjata” Hitt
text: I've been doing business with the Citizens Bank here since I was a just a kid, my father and I have been taking care of that big side yard next to it for as long as I can remember, we mow the grass up there. The folks here at the bank are all as nice as they can be, they all know me by first name as well. A good small-town bank that I am very happy to have an account with~

name: Justin Nix
text: This is a great place to do business. The people are all nice and courteous. I feel like family everytime I enter the doors.

name: Sweet Home Alamanda
text:
Wow...unsure of who the "friendly dark-haired lady" was that apparently thought that ME- a white, blonde-headed woman in a Honda was a terrorist ready to break into your "old hat" bank in the morning as they opened. I live almost 2 hours from here, and once per month I drive a long way to have an appointment at a nearby salon...so near you can see it from the bank. I arrived early and they were mowing and weed eating all around the parking lot to the salon which wasn't open yet, so I parked at the nearby bank at 7:30 in an area where other cars were parked and it had a covering overhead, which helped with the sun, and I also used the space at the end- the furtherest parking space from the door. Well, when the employees started coming in there was one lady that wouldn't stop staring me down as if I were a member of Al Qaeda waiting to rush in and rob the bank, and looking at me extremely rude. She stared me down all the way until she got to the door to unlock it and then just stood there with the door open staring at me more (smart thing to do if you think there's a security risk going on). I didn't think much of it because I was minding my own business and eating a biscuit and looking down at my phone most of the time. But then I look up again and she had an entire clan of people looking at me (employees who had arrived and were standing outside of their cars in the parking lot); she was looking at them in the parking lot as if they shouldn't try to walk into the bank because me, *the possible big bad mean bank robber* might try to rush them. I'm a person sitting here waiting for a business to open and I've actually sat in the same exact parking spot 5-6 times before without any issue. Once I realized what was going on I saw a man walking over to my car and I rolled down my window, and I explained to him what I was doing and that after using THEIR ATM I was just waiting on a business to open. He then said that they just weren't sure what I was up to.

I will say, just based on this incident I am so glad I am not a customer of your bank. I understand having to have security, but this isn't it. I don't know what happened to small town courtesy, hospitality and friendliness but it certainly doesn't reside here. I used your ATM, but that's one fee you'll never get from me again.

name: adam green
text: Always a pleasure doing business with these people. Thank you.

name: David McCurry
text: Heather Burrough and John Starnes at Cadence Bank have helped several of my clients with estate and conservatorship accounts.  Not all banks will offer these services and I'm thankful that they have the expertise and knowledge to do so.  They are very professional and easy to work with.  I would recommend them to anyone.

name: Brian Smith
text: Heather and her staff have always been super accommodating, polite, and respectful. If you are looking for a relationship with your bank and not just being looked at as another number I would highly recommend Cadence Bank downtown Huntsville.

name: Jeremy Patton
text: I have been to this bank several times with only great experiences. Specifically, Heather and John were always professional, helpful and extremely friendly!

name: Eddie Ethridge Jr
text: Worst bank in the city horrible customer service.  Heather was horrible never go there for business. I would give 0 stars if I could.

resp.text: Hi Eddie, We are terribly sorry to hear you feel that way and can assure you that Cadence strives to provide the best possible customer service. If you’d like, you may send your name and phone number to social@cadencebank.com so we can have someone get in touch with you directly to discuss your experience. Don’t hesitate to let us know if we can assist with anything. Thanks, LZ

I will be closing my account at this bank as soon as possible.

text: Samatha at the drive through window was very ugly to me. She would not let me explain what I was trying to do with my 2 checks and would ignore me when I was trying to explain it to her. Daniela was very nice and because she let me explain the situation, she was able to complete my deposits. I will be calling corporate about my unbelievable experience. I have been a regions customer for 10 years and I have never been treated so poorly.

text: Horrible. Go to another Regions and stay away from this one! Always a wait at least 10 minutes long. Usually one person working drive through and one person working walking. But always 3 or 4 other people setting in there cubes that never offer to help! Stay away.

text: Love banking with them. My only complaint is I get off work at 4pm. I can never make it there to do any business unless I ask to leave early at work. Don't see why they can't stay open just 30 mins longer 🤷.

name: coreyseth88
text: Drive thru always takes forever

name: Jessica D
text: I love my Tyndall! Everyone knows me there and greets me by name every single time I walk in, asks how my business is going, and overall makes me feel welcome and valued. I've gotten two mortgages through Tyndall and honestly would recommend Debbie Beasock to anyone for above and beyond wonderful service, not to mention the great rates and all the money saved on lending fees! I do all my banking through Tyndall for the ease of it all but also because I truly appreciate the associates at my local branch. Great service goes a long way!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words, Jessica! We truly appreciate your membership, and we're happy to hear about your good experience working with Debbie on your mortgage.

name: Nanoir 2688
text: My only complaint would be is that Atm stays down alot.

resp.text: Hi, Thank you for leaving us a 3-Star review. We apologize for the inconvenience regarding the ATMs. We are in the process of completing construction of 2 new branch locations. This has caused the temporary outages with relocating the ATMS. This will be resolved as we’re wrapping construction up over the next month or so. Thank you for your patience and for being a loyal member!

name: M Stevens
text: Went here with my son to get the title to a new vehicle he purchased. I waited outside while he went in with members to pay off their loan and get the title to his new vehicle he had purchased from credit bureau members who were only wanting the payoff in exchange for sale of their Honda Odyssey van. The whole process took less than 20 minutes, I was surprised after reading reviews of TFC being slow. That was not the case for us.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and Congrats to your son on his new vehicle purchase! We're happy that your experience was excellent as we're striving to speed the processes up in order to create better member experiences.

name: Joel Bullock
text: Never had a problem with Tyndall Fed Credit Union and have used a few others during my life time. They are always willing take care of any banking needs that i may have from making deposits to making a loan. Their friendly staff makes it a pleasure to do business with. I highly recommend them to everyone who would only want the best in the banking business.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Joel. We love doing business with you, as well. Thank you for your membership.

name: Naima Phillips (miamixmade)
text: The teller that I had was very pleasant and nice. She worked quick to get my transaction completed and thanked me for putting my account number on the back of my check. Thank you for your great customer service!

Hi, we apologize for the inconveniences you experienced when using Online Banking and Genie24. Our systems were offline due to regular scheduled maintenance until 6:00AM (CST) this morning. In the future if experiencing these types of issues, please check tyndall.org and you can see a notification on the website of regular schedule system maintenance windows. Tyndall Federal Credit Union

name: Art of Zink
text:
I have been with this credit union happily for six years, but I believe I no longer will be after what has happened tonight.
I was waiting on my check to clear today so that I could get a ride home from the convention that I am currently working at in Columbus, Ohio. My check cleared, but Tyndall Federal Credit Union's system decided to automatically withhold every last dime from my pay check. Not only do I not have access to any of my funds, I couldn't even get a ride back to my hotel, and I'm stranded in the middle of a city that I'm unfamiliar with. After calling every number I could think of (and even frantically trying to contact them on Facebook messenger), The only option I had was to call local police dispatch to get a ride back to my hotel so that I didn't have to walk back through a dangerous part of town.
The fact that you don't have an after hours emergency service number has literally put me in a very dangerous situation. it's a shame, but I don't believe I will be banking with you any longer.

resp.text: Leah, we are very sorry to hear about your experience, and we hope that our Member Services Department was able to clear everything up when you spoke this week. We truly value your membership.

text: I don't think I could ever say enough good things about this bank! They go above and beyond for their customers!! We traveled out of town to West Virginia and back of course we used our debit cards on our trip. We came home an my husband tried to use his debit card at the store and it was declined, he gave them cash an went on his way. He makes it to his truck an our bank called to inform him that someone tried to use his debit card in New York, and as soon as they saw that charge they froze his card. Then asked if he would like one mailed or he could pick it up next day at our local branch. We had no idea this had happened, but these awesome people stopped it before we even knew we had any problems!! If this is not great banking and customer service I don't know what is!!! Thank you guys!!!!

text: Tried to  deposit  cash into my wife's  checking  account . Teller  informed  me  she could  not  take a cash deposit because I didn't  have her id. It's  funny that the ATM didn't  complain  about  the  same  cash. Just another  reason  why I  changed banks.

name: Alicia Shah
text: They act a little snobby there,  not all of them, but enough for me to not go except on Saturdays and ONLY if i really got to.  Also,  i run a business and 1 time i went to get a bunch of rolled coins.  Once given to me, there was NO way i could carry all them rolled coins and 5s, 1s, 10s, etc without something to put them in.  But,  the teller looked at me,  waiting for me to collect and go.. when i asked for something to put them in i got looked at funny and she said they had nothing to put them in and thought i brought something to put them in.  This was all last second for me,  i didn't know i needed all that till i got a call from an employee of mine... so, after explaining how the NICE ladies at the other branch usually give me an empty coin box to use,  magically she came up with an empty penny box.  But,  also didn't bother to help me fill it up either.  The branch one jefferson street is so much better!! Love the ladies over there! They do EVERYTHING they can to make life so much easier on me,  while wearing a REAL smile on their faces! Too bad i got to go today... they really should open the jefferson branch on Saturdays, might get a little more business... just sayin...

name: Joe Mallory
text: We have had trouble several times just trying to deposit checks into our checking account! It seems one particular teller in the drive through is responsible for this! If we where going to cash a check written to us and keep the money I could see a little more but going into our checking account I donot understand! It has got to the point we are going to another bank after 20 years with ya'll!

name: LaTisha Byrd
text: We love United Bank and the hometown personal experience we get with each branch. We are truly blessed to be able to have a bank where you can call and ask for someone by name. Having that personal banking relationship makes life so much easier to navigate.

name: Kc Haze
text: Super friendly staff, quick, and attentive. $100 deposit to own an account.

name: Daniella Pedraza
text: Friendly staff

name: Dan Woodcock
text: Friendly Staff

name: Stormy Goodwin
text: Don't waste your time with this bank. My mother has had an account with them for 10+ years and it's a joke.  Fraud protection = you hunting down the information for them.  She has a "mortgage" through them that doesn't even appear on her credit report.  I can go on and on about them, but you can figure it out for yourself. You are better off banking with a company who has the balls to back you and your finances!

name: Rebecca Graham
text: Great service for small businesses. We love this bank...just wish there was a branch in Ashland.

name: Mattie Brown
text: great bank to bank with. friendly and courteous  personnel.

name: CSA
text: Really nice people too deal with

name: Severance Sorrow
text: I needed to take care of some financial matters on behalf of my recently deceased mother, The lady i spoke with Miss Delinda Whitmire was extremely helpful and helped make an unfortunate and emotional circumstance a bit more tolerable. I very much appreciate the help and guidance i recieved and would like to thank her and this branch for finalizing the matters at hand. She was knowledgable and professional and very caring. If there were more people like her, the world would indeed be a better place! I hope she receives the recognition she deserves.

resp.text: I am truly sorry for your loss. I'm glad to see that you had such a positive experience with Delinda and the other team members at this location. Thank you for taking the time to share this feedback and have a great rest of your day. -Shannon, Wells Fargo HL Social

name: Penny Pincher
text: This is the worst branch ever. If you can, I highly recommend you do your banking elsewhere. Their processes are the most antiquated I've seen anywhere. The tellers act as if they're entitled, rude and so snooty! You are all servants to the community that bank here which allows you to receive a paycheck. Be grateful. Humble yourselves and then act accordingly. However, I don't think any changes will be made as long as they have the same branch manager.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your feedback. I truly apologize for the customer service you experienced at this branch and would like to review what happened in detail. Please email me at HLSocial@wellsfargo.com with your full name, phone number, mailing address, Google username, and also mention your review on a Wells Fargo location (no account numbers). I look forward to trying to help. -AJ, Wells Fargo HL Social
